Title: A Tempest in a Starbucks Cup
Description: The plain red design stirs overcaffeinated complaints about the war on Christmas.
Data: Is there a war against Christmas? There’s certainly a war over the war against Christmas—and it came early this year. The opening skirmish features the   Starbucks  span SBUX    -1.82  %       scarlet cup that, starting in November, signals the end of the pumpkin spice latte days and the beginning of the season to be jolly.
